Nicaragua - Proyecto de Agua y
            Saneamiento en Managua : marco de politica de reasentamiento involuntario

trustfund:
TF098868-Promoting Efficiency and
            Poverty-Focus of Public Water Utilities in Cen,TF090645-NICARAGUA WATER SUPPLY AND
            SANITATION PROJECT,TF018089-ENACAL Master Plan for
            Operational Efficiency in Managua/Nicaragua,TF014483-NI Greater Managua Water and
            Sanitation (Prasma)
theme: Urban services and housing for the poor

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Project are to
            establish the set of guidelines, principles and procedures
            governing the effects of involuntary resettlement caused by
            the implementation of the Water and Sanitation Project in
            Managua (PRASMA), and the definition of roles and functions
            that the institutions involved will have to meet and to
            ensure communities their rights. The project will contribute
            to increased access to water and sanitation services in poor
            neighborhoods of Managua and will improve the quality and
            sustainability of water and sanitation services provided by
            the Nicaraguan Aqueducts and Sewer Healthcare (ENACAL).in
            Managua. There are some potential negative impacts caused by
            land acquisition and possible socio-economic conditions of
            the populations affected by the involuntary resettlement.
